trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Számoknak <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: Use the ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class to iterate through a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> objects.
trans-unit.target: A ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection osztály használatával egy gyűjteményét iterációt <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objektumok.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection of objects using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A> property or the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ez a gyűjtemény-objektumok használatával végezheti el a <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>tulajdonság vagy a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup.SectionGroups%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.SectionGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection class is also used in the creation of custom types that extend the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> class.
trans-unit.target: A ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection osztály is használatban van, amelyek a <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>osztály</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> felhasználói típusok létrehozása

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Hozzáad egy <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> ezen objektum <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: By default, this method adds the specified <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup> object if it is not already contained within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Alapértelmezés szerint ez a módszer hozzáadja a megadott <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>objektumot, ha nem már szerepel a gyűjteményben.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: Neve a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> felvenni kívánt objektum.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be added.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> felvenni kívánt objektum.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény törlése.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer akkor csomagolásának a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object to an array.
trans-unit.target: Másolja át a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> tömb objektumot.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy the object to.
trans-unit.target: Másolja át az objektumot a tömbben.

trans-unit.source: The index location at which to begin copying.
trans-unit.target: Az index helyet, ahol a másolásához.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: The length of array is less than the value of plus index.
trans-unit.target: A hossza array értéke kisebb plus index .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a szakasz csoportok száma a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the number of section groups in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Egész szám, amely a gyűjtemény szakasz csoportok számát jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a megadott <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum szerepel a gyűjteményben.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer akkor csomagolásának a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Az index a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum vissza kell adni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a megadott <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a gyűjteményből.

trans-unit.source: This method is a wrapper around the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ez a módszer akkor csomagolásának a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.BaseGet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Neve a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum vissza kell adni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott névvel.

trans-unit.source: name is null or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: nameNULL értékű vagy üres karakterlánc ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi számbavevő is iterációt az <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>, amelyek segítségével iterációt az <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets the key of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a megadott kulcsa <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> lévő ez <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group whose key is to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Az index a szakasz csoport, amelynek kulcsa vissza kell adni.

trans-unit.source: The key of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A kulcs a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: Used by the system during serialization.
trans-unit.target: A szerializálás során a rendszer által használt.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method is used during serialization; that is, when persisting configuration data to a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: A GetObjectData metódus; a szerializálás során használatos Ez azt jelenti, hogy mikor megőrzése konfigurációs adatokat a konfigurációs fájlt.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazandó <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The applicable <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Az alkalmazandó <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objektum.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum, amelynek indexe van megadva a gyűjteményből.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Az index a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum vissza kell adni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A C#, ez a tulajdonság az indexelő a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum, amelynek a nevét megadja a gyűjteményből.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Neve a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum vissza kell adni.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott névvel.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A C#, ez a tulajdonság az indexelő a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: Gets the keys to all <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> objects contained in this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a kulcsok összes <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> ezen objektumok <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> object that contains the names of all section groups in this collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>objektum, amely tartalmazza a gyűjteményben lévő összes szakasz csoport nevét.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose name is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> objektum a megadott nevű <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The name of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Az eltávolítani kívánt csoport neve.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"></xref> object whose index is specified from this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Eltávolítja a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup"> </xref> indexet van megadva, ez az objektum <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroupCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The index of the section group to be removed.
trans-unit.target: Az eltávolítani kívánt csoport indexe.
